mapper.update:
UPDATE `jpy_wepay_res` SET
`id` = #{set.id},
`mchid` = #{set.mchid},
`out_trade_no` = #{set.out_trade_no},
`create_time` = #{set.create_time},
`transaction_id` = #{set.transaction_id},
`trade_type` = #{set.trade_type},
`trade_state` = #{set.trade_state},
`trade_state_desc` = #{set.trade_state_desc},
`bank_type` = #{set.bank_type},
`attach` = #{set.attach},
`success_time` = #{set.success_time},
`payer` = #{set.payer},
`id` in
#{item} and
(
`Id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`mchid` in
#{item} and
(
`Mchid` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Mchid` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`out_trade_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Out_trade_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Out_trade_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`create_time` in
#{item} and
(
`Create_time` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Create_time` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`transaction_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Transaction_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Transaction_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`trade_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Trade_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Trade_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`trade_state` in
#{item} and
(
`Trade_state` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Trade_state` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`trade_state_desc` in
#{item} and
(
`Trade_state_desc` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Trade_state_desc` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`bank_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Bank_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Bank_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`attach` in
#{item} and
(
`Attach` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Attach` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`success_time` in
#{item} and
(
`Success_time` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Success_time` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`payer` in
#{item} and
(
`Payer` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Payer` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
